Scripts.OnValueChanged: -- ChatFrame1:AddMessage(self:GetName().." OnValueChanged. value="..tostring(value)) if ItemRack.testLoaded then ItemRackOpt.SliderValueChanged(self) else -- ChatFrame1:AddMessage("Attempted OnValueChanged prior to OnLoad") end

Scripts.OnMouseDown: local check = getglobal(self:GetName().."CheckButton") if check:IsVisible() and check:IsEnabled()==1 then check:SetNormalTexture("Interface\\Buttons\\UI-CheckBox-Down") else ItemRackOptFrame:StartMoving() end
Scripts.OnMouseUp: local check = getglobal(self:GetName().."CheckButton") if check:IsVisible() and check:IsEnabled()==1 then check:SetNormalTexture("Interface\\Buttons\\UI-CheckBox-Up") else ItemRackOptFrame:StopMovingOrSizing() end
Scripts.OnEnter: ItemRackOpt.OptListOnEnter(self,self:GetID()) local check = getglobal(self:GetName().."CheckButton") if check:IsVisible() and check:IsEnabled()==1 then check:LockHighlight() end
Scripts.OnLeave: GameTooltip:Hide() local check = getglobal(self:GetName().."CheckButton") if check:IsVisible() and check:IsEnabled()==1 then check:UnlockHighlight() end

FontString.name: ItemRackOptEventsLabel
FontString.text: Check an event to enable it:
Choose a slot to set up its auto queue order.
Select a slot to bind to a key.

Scripts.OnUpdate: self.timer = self.timer + elapsed if self.timer > 1 then self.timer = 0 if not MouseIsOver(self) and not MouseIsOver(ItemRackOptEventEditTypeDrop) then self:Hide() end end

FontString.name: ItemRackOptEventEditStanceNote
FontString.text: You can use the stance number or the name of the stance/form. The name will only work for Druids, Rogues and Warriors.
